name: sculpture
description: A waist-high, fixed block of smoothened marble, serving as a plinth. With its head cocked and reptilian jaws parted, the life-sized sculpture of a Deinonychus crouches atop it, one of its clawed feet planted atop an elevated outcropping, as it noiselessly growls at the carnage of the cataclysm.

name: sculpture
description: A waist-high, fixed block of smoothened marble, serving as a plinth.  Coiled about its peak like some form of oversized lizard, the quadruped sculpture of a dimetrodon rests in languid repose, its front claws draped over the slab's lip.

name: sculpture
description: A waist-high, fixed block of smoothened marble, serving as a plinth.  Its top is adorned with the worn sculpture of a Smilodon, the robust feline standing poised with its head raised and sabre-like fangs bared.

name: sculpture
description: a waist-high, fixed block of smoothened marble, serving as a plinth.  Its crest bears an Ostridge-like sculpture of a lanky Struthiomimus, with its reptilian neck poised in a sidelong ark and head cocked.
